meanings.definition: A group or system of interconnected people or things.
meanings.sent1: In our school, the students form networks to help each other with homework.
meanings.sent2: The social networks online allow people to connect with friends and family.
meanings.sent3: At the party, the networks of friends mingled and shared stories.
meanings.sent4: The networks of roots in the forest create a strong and supportive ecosystem.
meanings.sent5: The networks of pipes in the building ensure water reaches every room efficiently.

meanings.definition: A system of broadcasting or telecommunications.
meanings.sent1: The television networks broadcast news and entertainment to viewers.
meanings.sent2: Cell phone networks enable people to communicate with each other wirelessly.
meanings.sent3: The networks of satellites in space help transmit signals across the globe.
meanings.sent4: The radio networks reach listeners far and wide with music and talk shows.
meanings.sent5: The internet networks connect people from different countries in real-time.
